messages.subject: PS2
messages.msgSnippet: Anyone trying to afford a game system and struggling with it, please check out your local pawn shops. You can call around to see what they have before you go,
messages.messageBody:
Anyone trying to afford a game system and struggling with it, please check
out your local pawn shops. You can call around to see what they have before
you go, also check the classifieds in the newspaper.
We got our entire N64 system, controllers and three games for $50.

My kids are getting the gamecube for Christmas, I can't wait to see their
faces!!!

Ren
"Knowledge will not always take the place of simple observation."
~Arnold Lobel
Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
